text: Sidney Kramer (July 8, 1925 â€“ May 16, 2022) was an American Democratic politician and politician. He was a member of the Maryland Senate from 1978 until 1986. He was also the county executive for Montgomery County from 1986 until 1990. Kramer was born in Washington, D.C.. Kramer died on May 16, 2022 at his home in Rockville, Maryland at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2022 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Washington, D.C. title: Sidney Kramer
